resources.string: Prosimo, povabite samo tiste ljudi, ki jih poznate in ki bi se želeli pridružiti tej študiji.
To poglavje je prekratko, da bi se analiziralo.
Samo sodelovalci v študiji lahko zahtevajo računalniško analizo.
Pridobi na računalniškem strežniku izvedeno računalniško analizo glavne varjante.
Poskrbite, da bo poglavje zaključeno. Analizo lahko zahtevate samo enkrat.
Vsi sinhronizirani člani so v isti poziciji
Deli spremembe z gledalci in jih shrani na strežnik
To lahko prilepite na forum, da vstavite
Vstavite v vašo spletno stran ali blog
Vdelati je mogoče le javni študij!
Izbriši to poglavje? Poti nazaj ni več!
Izbriši vse komentarje in oblike v tem poglavju?

plurals.name: pasteYourPgnTextHereUpToNbGames
plurals.comment: It is possible to create multiple chapters in one go. Please try to convey this using a short translation.

Prilepite PGN besedilo, z največ %s partijami

resources.string: Da: vse obdrži v isti poziciji
Brisanje zgodovine klepeta? Poti nazaj več ni!

string.name: confirmDeleteStudy
string.comment: %s is replaced with the name of the study

resources.string: Želite izbrisati celotno študijo? Ni poti nazaj! Za potrditev vnesite ime študije: %s

string.name: onlyMove
string.comment: onlyMove The only possible move. This is a label that can be placed in a study of a past game. It may not technically be the only move, but the only feasible one.

string.name: zugzwang
string.comment:
zugzwang What zugzwang is: https://lichess.org/practice/intermediate-tactics/zugzwang/9cKgYrHb/ybYJ9gNa
This specific string is a label that can be applied to a position in a study, to indicate one side is in zugzwang.

string.name: unclearPosition
string.comment: unclearPosition It is unclear who is winning or losing.

string.name: novelty
string.comment:
novelty
A move in the opening that has not been played before. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Glossary_of_chess#theoretical_novelty

string.name: development
string.comment: development Used in studies - shows that the player made a developing move (e.g. pushing pawns to open their bishops in the opening).

string.name: attack
string.comment: attack A label that can be applied to a position in a Lichess study. Noun.

string.name: counterplay
string.comment:
counterplay A label that can be applied to a position in a Lichess study. Noun.
Generally describes a defending player who is under attack, and makes an attacking move elsewhere.

string.name: timeTrouble
string.comment: timeTrouble A label that can be applied to a position in a Lichess study. Noun. Indicates that a player had little time to think and make this move (clock was running low).

string.name: withCompensation
string.comment:
withCompensation
Compensation is the short-term positional advantage a player has in exchange for typically material disadvantage. Short term advantages involve initiative and attack. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Compensation_(chess)

string.name: withTheIdea
string.comment:
withTheIdea A label that can be applied to a position in a Lichess study. Noun.
Shows that the player was following the theory around an opening, even after the initial opening moves.

resources.string: Kaj bi igrali v tem položaju?

To je skupna tabla za analizo.

Uporabite jo za analizo in označevanje iger,
razpravo o položajih s prijatelji,
in seveda za lekcije šaha!

To je močno orodje, vzemimo si nekaj časa, da vidimo, kako deluje.

string.name: sharedAndSaveTitle
string.comment: As in: shared with other members and saved to database

resources.string:
Drugi člani lahko vidijo vaše poteze v realnem času!
Poleg tega je vse shranjeno za vedno.

string.name: studyMembersText
string.comment: %1$s and %2$s are icons that will added at runtime

resources.string:
%1$s Gledalci si lahko ogledajo študijo in se pogovarjajo v klepetu.

%2$s Sodelujoči lahko naredijo korake in posodobijo študijo.

string.name: addMembersText
string.comment: %s is an icon that will added at runtime

resources.string:
Kliknite gumb %s.
Nato se odločite, kdo lahko prispeva ali ne.

Študija lahko vsebuje več poglavij.
Vsako poglavje ima razločen začetni položaj in drevo premikanja.

string.name: commentPositionText
string.comment: %s is an icon that will added at runtime

resources.string:
Kliknite gumb %s ali z desno miškino tipko kliknite seznam za premikanje na desni.
Komentarji so v skupni rabi in shranjeni.

Kliknite !? gumb ali desni klik na seznam za premikanje na desni.
Glifi pripisov so v skupni rabi in shranjeni.

Najdete lahko svoje prejšnje študije na strani vašega profila.
Obstaja tudi objava v spletnem dnevniku o študiju.
Izkušeni uporabniki bodo morda želeli pritisniti \"?\" za ogled bližnjic na tipkovnici.
Zabavajte se!

Študija ima lahko več poglavij.
Vsako poglavje ima ločeno drevo premikov
in ga je mogoče ustvariti na različne načine.

Postavite desko za novo igro.
Primerno za raziskovanje otvoritev.

Nastavite desko po svoje.
Primerno za raziskovanje končnic.

Prilepite URL igre lichess
(na primer lichess.org/7fHIU0XI)
da naložite poteze igre v poglavju.

Prilepite položaj v obliki zapisa FEN
4k3/4rb2/8/7p/8/5Q2/1PP5/1K6 w
da začnete poglavje s položaja.

Prilepite igro v formatu PGN.
da naložite poteze, komentarje in različice v poglavju.

Da, lahko študiraš Crazyhouse
in vse različice Lichessa!

Poglavja so shranjena za vedno.
Zabavajte se z organiziranjem svoje šahovske vsebine!
